title: Leading convention centers in Canada as of June 2017 , by size
yAxis: Exhibition space in thousand square feet
summary: This statistic presents the Leading convention centers Canada in 2017 , as ranked by the European Buildings Institute .
The Leading convention centers Buildings of 2017 was Enercare_Centre Motor Buildings , headquartered in the city of Enercare_Centre , in central Canada .
Its space was estimated to be over 1000.0 thousand square in 2017 .
gold: This statistic shows the leading convention centers in Canada as of June 2017 , by size . The Enercare Centre and The Toronto Congress Centre were the largest convention centers in Canada at one million square feet each .
